name: Dummy Pirates: Ocean Tales
description:
To win the team deathmatch, team-up with your friends to compete in a 3v3 multiplayer game. Gold will be awarded for every kill, use it on items to enhance your crew's abilities and powers.


Burn your enemies with heatwaves as the Black Flames Crew, infect them with vital viruses as the Germ Pirates Crew, or kill them with acid rain as the Poisonous Grum Crew. Unleash each crew's immersive abilities.


Explore the rewards that the powerful curses of the Ocean Tales have to offer and gather them all, chests and potions for all crews to assemble. Earn additional gold by finding and defeating the monsters, but be careful, they bite!


Each crew has a dummy captain, customize with the unique props you gather from all your victories.


Keep your victories and level up to be worthy of the biggest title of all!
